h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai
content: Often times when it returns to crawl on the ground, it will take a few moments to pause and groom itself, giving you a huge window to attack, just watch your spacing or use a Pillar Stance to get out of the poison goo on the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Centipede Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Often times when it returns to crawl on the ground, it will take a few moments to pause and groom itself, giving you a huge window to attack, just watch your spacing or use a Pillar Stance to get out of the poison goo on the ground.
